TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_demiad, title = demiad, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/demiad} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:日子,白天,白晝,氣候) misakakawaw kaku tu demiad. 我白天去上班.
(kamo no holam:日子,白天,白晝,氣候) misakakawaw kako to demiad. 我白天去上班.
